# 2-minute profile polish

**Bio, profile links, and pinned repos are set only on GitHub.com** (not in this repo). Do the steps below on your profile; then you’re done.

**Where:** [github.com/FullStack-Manmohan](https://github.com/FullStack-Manmohan) → click **Edit profile** (or **Customize your pins** for step 3).

---

## 1. Bio (copy-paste)

In **Edit profile** → **Bio**, replace everything with this (one line):

```
Software Engineer @ RCUH (UHERO) · Full-Stack React, Next.js, Node.js · HIPAA-compliant dashboards · Honolulu, HI · Open to work & select projects
```

---

## 2. Profile links (no duplicate)

In **Edit profile** → **Links**:

| Slot   | Use this URL | Label (optional) |
|--------|----------------|------------------|
| Link 1 | `https://www.manmohanyadav.com` | Website |
| Link 2 | `https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/manmohanyadav` | Upwork |

So you keep your site once and use the second slot for Upwork (no duplicate manmohanyadav.com).

---

## 3. Pinned repositories (6 repos)

Profile → **Customize your pins** → choose **6** repos → for each, add:

- **Description** (one short line)
- **Topics** (e.g. `javascript`, `react`, `nodejs`, `fullstack`)

**Suggested pins** (use your best 6; if you have other React/Next.js/Node repos, prefer those):

| Repository | Suggested description | Suggested topics |
|-------------|------------------------|------------------|
| Bunk-Mate | Attendance manager for college students — full-stack | `javascript`, `fullstack`, `webapp` |
| AnyLi-Master | Full-stack / automation project | `javascript`, `fullstack` |
| Note-Hunt | Ear training web app | `javascript`, `webapp`, `frontend` |
| Uniquote- | Quotation software for Unifrost | `javascript`, `automation` |
| Wisdom | Book store app — Google Books API, C++/Qt | `c++`, `qt`, `api` |
| PHP-Developer-Coding-Exemple | PHP / full-stack examples | `php`, `backend`, `fullstack` |

If you have repos that are clearly **React**, **Next.js**, or **Node.js**, pin those and use topics: `react`, `nextjs`, `nodejs`, `fullstack`, `dashboard`.

---

## 4. Save

Click **Save** (or **Save changes**) on the profile / pins screen. No need to push any code — everything above is done on GitHub.com.

---

*After steps 1–3, your profile bio, links, and pins match your README and look hire-ready.*
